mapper.select: select id, loginAct, name, email, loginPwd, grade, major, department, classId from tbl_student where loginAct=#{loginAct} and loginPwd=#{loginPwd}

SELECT s.id, s.loginAct, s.name, s.email, s.loginPwd, s.grade, s.major, s.department, s.classId AS classId, c.name as className, t.id AS teacherId, t.name AS teacherName
FROM tbl_student s JOIN tbl_class c ON c.id=s.classId JOIN tbl_teacher t ON c.teacherId = t.id
